item.title: You NEED Backups Tapes....Probably
item.description: As a veteran IT professional, I love to argue as much as the next veteran IT professional. Mostly my arguments are harmless debates about the pros and cons of different brands of software, different architectural designs and who is the best companion in Doctor Who.
